title: League Screen Saver files stored ?
body:
Hi , just want to know where is the League Screen Saver files stored , so i can copy and make it to live wallpaper !
here is a League Screen Saver website : http://screensaver.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en_AU

replies.body:
Hey there,

Below are steps to open all the images from the league screensaver.

* Open the Screensaver settings and select the images you want. Save it.
* Go to %appdata%/Roaming/LolScreenSaver/cefCache
* There will be lots of files with no extension. Opening them in Notepad shows that they are JFIF. Add .jpg to the end of the files.
* Open in whatever tool you use to view images :)
 * Files that you cannot open are most likely animated splashes! Change their extension to '.webm' to view them!
